mapper.select: select u.user_id as userId, u.name, u.email, u.password, u.role, u.status as status from user u where u.email = #{email}
mapper.insert: insert into current_login (email, remote_addr, last_login_time, last_refresh_time, expiration_time_limit, refresh_token) values (#{email}, #{remoteAddr}, NOW(), NOW(), #{expirationTimeLimit}, #{refreshToken}) on duplicate key update remote_addr = #{remoteAddr}, last_login_time = NOW(), last_refresh_time=NOW(), expiration_time_limit=#{expirationTimeLimit}, refresh_token=#{refreshToken}
